    • Method Detail

      • basic

        public void basic(java.lang.String user,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  boolean preemptive)
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Auth

        Configures the request to use BASIC authentication with the given username and password.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
     request.auth.basic 'admin', '$3cr3t', true
}
        Specified by:
        basic in interface HttpConfig.Auth
        Parameters:
        user - the username
        password - the user’s password
        preemptive - whether or not this call will override similar configuration in the chain

     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
     request.auth.digest 'admin', '$3cr3t', true
}
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        user - the username
        password - the user’s password
        preemptive - whether or not this call will override similar configuration in the chain
